original_text:
I, even I, have spoken and called him;
    I have brought him, and he will prosper in his way.
korean_text: 나 곧 내가 말하였고 또 내가 그를 부르며 그를 인도하였나니 그 길이 형통하리라

sentences.original_text: I, even I, have spoken and called him
sentences.korean_translation: 나 곧 내가 말하고 그를 불렀다

sentences.original_text: and he will prosper in his way
